item.title: 搭建HUGO博客
item.description: 搭建HUGO博客 # 安装hugo # 进入 release页面下载，选择下载 hugo_extended_0.97.0_Linux-64bit.deb带extended后缀的安装包 sudo dpkg -i hugo_extended_0.97.0_Linux-64bit.deb 创建hugo工程 # mkdir ~/Public/Book cd ~/Public/Book hugo new site ./ 下载主题 # git init git submodule add https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book themes/hugo-book cp -R themes/hugo-book/exampleSite/content . 运行Web服务 # ubuntu:~/Public/Book$ hugo server --minify --theme hugo-book --bind="0.0.0.0" -p 8888 Start building sites … hugo v0.97.0-c07f3626e7c8160943591f4d209977efa02c3dca+extended linux/amd64 BuildDate=2022-04-14T08:45:07Z VendorInfo=gohugoio WARN 2022/04/16 01:47:16 Expand shortcode is deprecated. Use 'details' instead. WARN 2022/04/16 01:47:16 Page '/layout/variables' not found in 'posts/goisforlovers.
